descript.abstract: This map shows the rate of change in total annual precipitation in the Chesapeake Bay watershed since 1901. The data are shown for climate divisions, as defined by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. For more information: www.epa.gov/climate-indicators
descript.purpose: Indicator of Climate Monitoring and Assessment Outcome on Chesapeake Progress. It shows the rate of change in total annual precipitation in the Chesapeake Bay watershed since 1901.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
